DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Neuraxial Anesthetic Technique Trial Labor After Cesarean ( TOLAC )
DOC.detailed_description: Though say , `` cesarean , always cesarean , '' current medical stance change encourages VBAC select population patient . VBAC several advantage repeat cesarean include decreased recovery period , decrease risk infection , avoidance major abdominal surgery , lessen blood loss ( 1 ) . Predictors success VBAC include previous spontaneous vaginal birth , singleton pregnancy , previous low transverse scar C-section delivery ( 1 ) . TOLAC reasonable option select pregnant woman associate 74 % likelihood VBAC ( 3 ) . Risk factor failure VBAC include labor dystocia , advance maternal age , maternal obesity , fetal macrosomia , gestational age ( GA ) > 40 week , short inter pregnancy interval , preeclampsia ( 1 ) . While success VBAC associate few complication , failure VBAC may associate increased complication ( 1 ) . A major concern VBAC possibility uterine rupture , may result hysterectomy intrapartum fetal hypoxia/death . According American College Obstetricians Gynecologists ( ACOG ) guideline , effective regional analgesia expect mask sign symptom uterine rupture , particularly common sign rupture fetal heart trace abnormality . Adequate pain relief achieve either CSE epidural may even encourage woman opt VBAC . The decision proceed TOLAC occur appropriate discussion risk benefit occur patient obstetrician long contraindication exist . The final decision leave patient . There reliable way predict risk uterine rupture , may associate classical low vertical uterine scar , induction labor , increase number prior cesarean delivery risk may decrease previous vaginal birth ( 3 ) . Other aspect VBAC versus repeat cesarean pertaining fetus consider include respiratory function , mother-infant contact , initiation breastfeeding , may delay cesarean delivery ( 3 ) . There little research concern effect CSEs epidural woman undergo TOLAC.There multiple study compare CSE epidural nulliparous multiparous woman , none do specifically patient undergo TOLAC . According American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) practice guideline obstetric anesthesia `` nonrandomized comparative study suggest epidural analgesia may use trial labor previous cesarean delivery patient without adversely affect incidence vaginal delivery . Randomized comparison epidural versus anesthetic technique find . '' They agree neuraxial technique improve likelihood vaginal delivery patient attempt VBAC suggest neuraxial catheter place event operative delivery ( 9 ) . Because study date compare CSEs epidural effect success VBAC , would like investigate arena . Inclusion criterion : ( patient meet ACOG guideline TOLAC ) ASA Patients 18 year age least one previous elective cesarean delivery , < 40 week gestational age ( GA ) , vertex singleton pregnancy use continuous fetal monitoring . Exclusion criterion : Patients undergo TOLAC refuse regional anesthetic contraindication regional anesthesia , less 18 year age , body mass index ( BMI ) > 40 associated comorbidities gestational diabetes , preeclampsia , abnormal placentation , etc . Specific outcome look include : Primary outcome : - Success vaginal birth cesarean ( VBAC ) Secondary outcome : - Success analgesia/ maternal satisfaction ( self- rat pain score 1-10 prior , 30 minute regional anesthetic perform 24 hrs post-delivery ) - If require repeat C-section instrumental delivery success regional anesthesia procedure . ( self- rat pain score 1-10 necessity use additional IV pain medication conversion general/ spinal anesthesia ) - Immediate side effect : fetal bradycardia , nausea , vomit , pruritus , hypotension require vasopressor - Late side effect i.e . post dural puncture headache Methods : When patient obstetric service request epidural labor analgesia , consult immediately place Anesthesia service . Patients request neuraxial anesthesia labor analgesia screen study . Written inform consent shall obtain patient prior enrollment prospective randomize clinical study . The regional anesthetic place obstetrical anesthesia team Lyndon B. Johnson Hospital , well-established partner University Texas Medical School Houston facility capable perform emergent C-section necessary . Patients shall randomize via computer generate randomization sequence assign separate study number different medical record number . The study code medical record number ( MRN ) save link log password protect drive . Standard ASA monitor apply patient include non-invasive blood pressure ( NIBP ) , pulse oximetry fetal heart monitor . Patients bolused 1 liter lactate ringer 's ( LR ) prior procedure via intravenous catheter . In epidural group , epidural place sterile fashion use 17g Tuohy needle locate epidural space via loss-of-resistance saline lumbar vertebral level . 3 ml 1.5 % lidocaine 5ug/ml epinephrine use test dose exclude intrathecal intravenous placement catheter . Epidural solution compose 5ml 0.2 % ropivacaine another 5 ml 0.2 % ropivacaine administer . In CSE arm , epidural space locate 17g Tuohy needle dural puncture perform 25g Pencan needle via needle-through-needle technique . Spinal injection 2ml 0.2 % ropivacaine perform spinal needle remove . An epidural catheter place test dose perform 3 ml 1.5 % lidocaine 5ug/ml epinephrine . Maintenance dose via epidural pump use 0.2 % ropivacaine rate 12 ml/hr . Self-determined numeric pain score obtain prior placement regional anesthetic delivery nursing staff . Analgesia consider successful numerical pain score value 3 less . Data collection perform via pain score obtain prior follow placement regional anesthetic establishment analgesia , along data maternal satisfaction . Electronic medical record also use gather result outcome . Data collect : Demographics : - age - weight - height - ethnicity - gestational age - reason previous cesarean/incision type know - previous SVD - pregnancy number - cervical dilation at/near time block ( perform obstetrician ) - estimate fetal weight Pain score : - RA - 15 minute , 30 minute , 60 minute regional anesthetic ( RA ) - 24 hour delivery Supplementation catheter boluses pain relief total dos give Side effect RA : - pruritus - nausea - vomit - hypotension - post dural puncture headache Neonatal outcome : - fetal heart rate immediate post regional - APGARs 1 min 5 min - birth weight Delivery : - date time cervix become fully dilate ( performed obstetrician ) - date time follow occur : - spontaneous vaginal delivery ( SVD ) - c-section - instrumentation Maternal Satisfaction - pain relief - childbirth experience Data Analysis Plan : Power Analysis Our null hypothesis difference success VBAC epidural CSEs woman undergo TOLAC . Our alternative hypothesis CSE result successful VBAC epidurals.The success rate VBAC around 74 % . Based literature , expect success rate CSE increase 20-25 % ; therefore , give sample size 60 , 80 % power detect difference two group . Primary Outcome The primary outcome , success VBAC , assess use χ2 Fisher Exact test , case cell size < 5 , determine difference success rate two analgesia group , CSE epidural , statistically significant . Logistic regression analysis use adjust potential confounders factor associate success failure VBAC . Secondary Outcomes The secondary outcome , success analgesia , measure pain score scale 1 10 , assess use ANOVA . Difference mean pain score two group determine model continuous/count variable pain score dependent variable analgesia group independent variable . Categorical outcome , include success regional anesthesia patient require C-section instrumental delivery , immediate side effect , late side effect evaluate use χ2 Fisher Exact test .
